title: WHIG Coordinates Systematic Deception in Classified Congressional Intelligence Briefings
description: The White House Iraq Group coordinates with legislative liaison Nicholas Calio to systematically deceive Congress through manipulated classified intelligence briefings designed to secure Iraq War authorization. WHIG members provide fabricated intelligence assessments to congressional leadership while suppressing contradictory evidence from CIA and other intelligence agencies. This systematic deception violates separation of powers by transforming the constitutional war authorization process into a propaganda-driven rubber stamp, using classified briefing privileges to prevent congressional oversight of intelligence manipulation.

By using classified briefing privileges to prevent congressional oversight, WHIG transformed the constitutional war powers framework into a propaganda-driven authorization mechanism, establishing dangerous precedents for executive manipulation of legislative authority.
